name: Goodbye Home (Team OIOG)
description:
Imagine that you are in the comfort of your home, and one morning you go out to see the beautiful sky, when suddenly you notice that something is approaching that could destroy that comfort. Will you perish or go in search of a new home?.

But be careful on the way you will meet creatures that complicate everything for you

Controls:

Movement arrows, "X" and "C".
